textBeforeTable: *4G LTE models may require LTE sim card, which is not included but will be provided by your carrier. Data plan may be required for use. This phone is guaranteed to work with your active Sprint PCS plan. There is no contract required. When you receive the phone, simply call your current carrier, activate this phone and start using it! 4G LTE models may require LTE sim card, which is not included but will be provided by your carrier. The Motorola PHOTON 4G is an Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) platform based smartphone, which lets you access the latest applications. Capture clear and bright images and videos with the 8-megapixel flash camera of this Motorola smartphone. Relish on-air music and get live updates with the FM radio and the Internet radio feature of this Motorola Android mobile. Stay connected with your colleagues, friends, and family, via the e-mail and IM feature of the Motorola PHOTON 4G smartphone. Surf the web from any Wi-Fi enabled spot, as this Motorola Sprint smartphone is Wi-Fi friendly. Integrated with a 1 GHz dual core processor, this Motorola Android mobile delivers optimum performance. Incorporating the Corning Gorilla glass and dual anti-reflective display, the Motorola PHOTON 4G smartphone is resistant to scratches and provides reflection-free images.
